name: ext_R5_BiologicallyDerivedProduct
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.BiologicallyDerivedProduct for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents BiologicallyDerivedProduct from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/BiologicallyDerivedProduct|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: This resource reflects an instance of a biologically derived product
element.definition:
This resource reflects an instance of a biologically derived product. A material substance originating from a biological entity intended to be transplanted or infused
into another (possibly the same) biological entity.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.short: This resource reflects an instance of a biologically derived product
element.definition:

into another (possibly the same) biological entity.
